statements: DELETE FROM environmental_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location_id = 5;
DELETE FROM environmental_data WHERE data_id = 100 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM environmental_data WHERE location_id = 500 AND carbon_emission_level > 50;
DELETE FROM vehicle_info WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND vehicle_type = 'SUV';
DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE carbon_emissions > 1000 AND location LIKE '%California%';
DELETE FROM EnvironmentalData WHERE data_id = 10 AND sensor_id = 5;
DELETE FROM environmental_data WHERE location='New York';
DELETE FROM emissions_standards WHERE max_emission_limit > 5.0 AND standard_name = 'EURO 6';
